title: Toxic players
body:
I have a range of accounts across different Elo's. From bronze up to Plat.
I am noticing an increasing amount of toxic players in all elo's. I think Riot needs to up the punishments. It's not acceptable to be toxic, chances are you wouldn't say it to me in person but hide behind a monitor and you let loose. 

It ranges from abuse in chat to afking in fountain because of a split push even though we are winning to just plain old intentional feeding. Telling players not just myself to uninstall the game ect. What is always amusing is that looking up these players in op.gg they are the ones feeding game after game. This isn't a cry for help or whatever because to be honest I couldn't care less what people say to me. 99% of the time I mute all in the first 10 seconds. 

Its more about the players who are just trying to have fun and are genuinely trying their best. But get insulted for doing so, It needs to stop. Double the punishments Riot.
